description: This file defines an interface for a test utility within the WPEFramework, including nested command and iterator interfaces, with function declarations for executing commands, retrieving command lists, and managing shutdown timeout.

classes.name: WPEFramework::Exchange::ITestUtility
classes.description: An interface for a test utility providing command execution and management features within WPEFramework.

classes.name: WPEFramework::Exchange::ITestUtility::ICommand
classes.description: An interface representing a command that can be executed by the test utility.

classes.name: WPEFramework::Exchange::ITestUtility::ICommand::IIterator
classes.description: An iterator interface to traverse available commands.

methods.name: Commands
methods.description: Returns an iterator for traversing available commands.

methods.name: Command
methods.description: Retrieves a specific command by name.

methods.name: ShutdownTimeout
methods.description: Sets or gets the timeout for shutdown procedures.

methods.name: ICommand::Execute
methods.description: Executes the command with provided parameters.

methods.name: ICommand::Description
methods.description: Provides a description of the command.

methods.name: ICommand::Signature
methods.description: Returns the signature of the command.

methods.name: ICommand::Name
methods.description: Returns the name of the command.

methods.name: IIterator::Reset
methods.description: Resets the iterator to the beginning.

methods.name: IIterator::IsValid
methods.description: Checks if the current iterator position is valid.

methods.name: IIterator::Next
methods.description: Advances the iterator to the next position.

methods.name: IIterator::Command
methods.description: Returns the command at the current iterator position.

ctags.name: ICommand
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL ICommand : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IIterator
ctags.pattern: /^            struct EXTERNAL IIterator : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: ITestUtility
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL ITestUtility : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
